resources.string: This effect has three main secrets. One, the coin is hidden beneath the phone prior to the effect. Two, when you drag the coin to the edge of the screen and your finger is about to reach the edge, the image of the coin disappears. This effect and pulling the real coin out from under the phone, looks like the coin was pulled right out of the phone. Three, on the second flip of the coin, you do not flip the coin into the air. You hold the coin back. Quickly shake the phone to make the coin reappear. The accelerometer detects the motion and triggers two events. The first event displays the coin in the center of the screen. The second event plays a noise to simulate the sound of the coin hitting screen.

A coin or small object appears on the phone. You drag the coin all over the screen. You drag the coin to the edge of the screen. You visibly pull the coin out of the phone. You flip the coin into the air and catch it. You flip the coin again. You catch the coin on the phone with a metal "ping" sound. The coin has reappeared inside the phone. An amazing effect!
